mapper.select: select id from `favorite` where vid = #{vid} and uid = #{uid}

select video.id, title, video.uid, video.description, video.datetime from `favorite`, `video` where `favorite`.vid = `video`.id and `favorite`.uid = #{uid} order by `favorite`.datetime desc limit #{pstart}, #{psize}
mapper.delete: delete from `favorite` where vid = #{vid} and uid = #{uid}
